about_the_game:
FG Monster Kit Beasts Art Pack

The Monster Kit Beasts Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art pack consists of images that can be used to create polypod monsters and creatures in a paper doll-style process. By combining heads, torsos, legs, and many more parts you are able to make a vast array of creatures for whatever you might need. This pack works seamlessly with Monster Kit and Monster Kit Robots.
This pack includes the following items:




  • token frames and token backgrounds
  • Multiple beast heads of reptilian, feline, dragon, and more
  • Miscellaneous body parts for insects, scales, and so on
  • 21 types of hind and front legs
  • Torsos for mammals, reptiles, birds, and more
  • Dragon wings, scorpion tails, and so much more
"

The Monster Kit Beasts Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools.
